items.sentence: The gondola ride wasn\'t as romantic as Tom and Mary had hoped.
The reason that that happened was because you weren\'t careful.
Before you go to visit him, you should make sure he\'s at home.
Even Tom wouldn\'t be stupid enough to say something like that.
He doesn\'t like to wait until the last moment to do something.
You should slow down when you approach a four-way intersection.
I give up. No matter what I do, you never seem to be satisfied.
I imagine that Tom will eventually be caught and put in prison.
I just told Tom that he should go out and buy something to eat.
I loved both the movie I saw today and the one I saw yesterday.
